title: Apply for a Community Arts Grant
description: A non-profit organization is applying for a grant from the city's arts council.

tasks.description: Verify the organization's eligibility for the grant program.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the non-profit is a registered 501(c)(3) and meets the grant criteria.

tasks.description: Guide the applicant through the online application, including uploading required documents like project budgets and narratives.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent helps the applicant successfully complete and submit the grant application.

tasks.description: Provide the applicant with a confirmation of submission and a timeline for the review process.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms receipt of the application and communicates next steps.
